item.description: how to setup passwordless SSH login: ssh-copy-id $(whoami)@${other_host} https://linuxize.com/post/how-to-setup-passwordless-ssh-login/ how to change a ubuntu machine’s computer’s hostname: echo "new-hostname" > sudo tee /etc/hostname; sudo sed -i 's/old-hostname/new-hostname/1' /etc/hosts; sudo hosname 'new-hostname'; # <- for changes to take effect prior to reboot h/t https://www.howtogeek.com/197934/how-to-change-your-hostname-computer-name-on-ubuntu-linux/
